titles.title: Regulatory Fairness Act
To provide an affirmative defense in a civil action brought with respect to a Federal requirement which is potentially in conflict with another Federal requirement.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law.

bill.summary: 7/26/1999--Introduced. Regulatory Fairness Act - Provides that it shall be an affirmative defense to a civil action brought against a person to enforce a Federal regulatory requirement that such requirement is potentially in conflict with another regulatory requirement with which such person is in compliance.
